lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: My dear friend Nick, is an amazing entrepreneur and is divinely inspired to lend to people who are making things happen all over the world and working hard to build their own businesses. He is truly an inspiration!
lender.occupational_info: I work in public schools in the U.S., teaching Spanish and working specifically with kids who are learning English and how to become successful academically.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: invest in the future
lender.occupational_info: solar energy research

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: We are all just pieces of the puzzle. It's a way to plug in some of my good fortune to the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician extender helping doctors be in two places at once.

lender.name: Steve & Karen
lender.loan_because: We are all God's children and we should share our blessings for His glory.
lender.occupational_info: I am the caretaker for a large camp, maintaining all the buildings, vehicles, boats, docks, trails and roads.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.occupational_info: Fulbright research fellow.

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: They need the money more than me. "Give a man some money, support him for a day. Loan a man some money, support him for his life."

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that I am doing something good

lender.name: Shirlee
lender.loan_because: My family,Bart-Suz & Nick sent me a gift certificate and this is a wonderful humane cause to keep on giving.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Empowering people is greater than charity.
lender.occupational_info: casting bronze into fine art and monuments

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate and I'm glad that I now know about this opportunity to help someone else out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in High School--9th grade. I love to play football more than anything else. I also love dogs. I have 2 Pommeranians, I play violin in youth orchestra.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me beyond measure and I want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I show the love of Jesus to others.

lender.loan_because: I want to loan people money so they can make their own job and pay me back and I can help give them a start to helping themselves
lender.occupational_info: I don't have a job but I do a lot of work!! Like feeding the chickens and helping in the garden taking care of the cow ,helping cook and cleaning the house.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I'm a medical student. I sit in class all day and try not to fall asleep or lose track of my goals

lender.loan_because: I care.....

lender.occupational_info: I work with pharmaceutical companies to aid patients with chronic conditions to find access to therapy for high cost medications or receive free medication from donations.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because:
I want to support people who look for entrepreneurial ways to improve their lives.
â€œYour time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.â€
- Steve Jobs
lender.occupational_info: I work to help law firms and companies organize documents in order to create searchable databases that allow easy access to their information.

lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help the people in this countries. Just giving money is useless.

Learned from Saadi (1184-1283), Persian poet:
Human beings are members of a whole, In creation of one essence and soul. If one member is afflicted with pain, Other members uneasy will remain. If you have no sympathy for human pain, The name of human you cannot retain.
lender.occupational_info: I am a counselor working with women who have experienced abuse and violence in their intimate relationship. lender.name: Bill from Bend, Oregon
lender.loan_because: As a repeat startup company entrepreneur, I find that the most energetic entrepreneurs in the world are the folks in developing countries who struggle every day to build better futures for themselves and their children. Aid doesn't appeal to these folks: business support is what they seek. This is sustainable development at its best!!
lender.occupational_info: Serial startup company executive with 20 years experience living /working in Asia, and thus have a cosmopolitan view of the world

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me this great gift certificate and I can't wait to loan out some money!!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Children's Room of my local library. I help kids find books for pleasure and for school work. I also decorate the bulletin boards and windows and help with storytime.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I view this as an opportunity to enable others to help themselves by providing funds that would otherwise be unavailable to them. I'd prefer that the recipients do not know what country I live in as I don't want anyone to think that I have any political motivations behind the loans.
lender.occupational_info: So easy, a caveman could do it.

lender.name: Lor
lender.loan_because: I believe in global interdependency
lender.occupational_info: Helping organizations make strategic decision by providing them with data.

lender.loan_because: If it weren't for loans, I wouldn't have been able to get an education or to buy a house. I feel very lucky - I want to share my luck with others.
